Wonpil

Introduction

DAY6 (Even of Day) (also simply known as Even of Day) is the first sub-unit of the boy band DAY6. Consisting of Young K, Won Pil and Do Woon, they debuted on August 31, 2020 with the mini album The Book of Us : Gluon - Nothing Can Tear Us Apart.
